All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Ball
Represents a ball
BallRubber
Represents a rubber ball
Brick
Represents a brick
BrickCement
Represents a cement brick
BrickClay
Represents a Clay brick
BrickFactory
Factory to create any type of brick
BrickSteel
Represents a steel brick
DebugMenuController
Controller that manages the IO with the debugMenu screen
ElementsManager
Represents an interface for all the gameplay elements
GameBoardPainter
Painter which draws all of the gameplay elements upon every refresh
GameFinishController
Controller that manages IO for dialog box when the game finishes
GameLoop
Loop to calculate logic and refresh the screen upon every frame
HighMenuController
Controller for the Highscores section of the start menu
LevelManager
Represents a level manager
MainGameController
Controller for the gameplay.
Paddle
Represents a paddle
ScoreManager
Manages the score of the current player.
SFXPlayer
Sound effects player
StartFrame
Start game class to run the application and make the main stage to draw on
StartMenuController
Controller for the Start Menu of the game
ThemeMaintainer
Singleton maintainer of themes and textures across the whole game
ThemeMenuController
Controller for the Theme menu
Wall
Represents the wall of bricks
